actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, to create within the Securities and Exchange Commission a Division of Consumer Affairs.

summary.text: Amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to establish a Division of Consumer Affairs within the Securities and Exchange Commission. Specifies the duties of such Division, including responding to complaints of individual investors and advising the Commission of the effect of proposed Commission action on the individual investor.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, to create within the Securities and Exchange Commission a Division of Consumer Affairs.
